attributes.title: ✨oh the racism✨
attributes.review: i saw a review some mentally ill person left, “the children and family of america are happy” ur talking about the whites right ? because hispanics and blacks are very unhappy. if you didn’t know, native americans lived here first and at one point owned it, you whites came from other countries like spain, next time you say “go back to your country” to a hispanic, think ab it and realize your talking to a MIRROR because YOU should go back to yours ✨how can you sleep at night knowing there’s kids in cages, that haven’t been fed, that are getting treated like ANIMALS. we’re all human and i don’t know when most of you whites will realize this, but i hope it’s soon. how about you treat us hispanics and blacks the same way you treat another white person? E.Q.U.A.L.I.T.Y.

attributes.title: Why are u president in the first place🍊👁👄👁
attributes.review: Let’s just get to the point why are u deleting tiktok what did it do to you maybe we didn’t come to a dumb stupid trump rally but you did deserve it stupid ugly orange 👁👄👁🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏾‍♀️ honestly what are you doing to help America and I don’t understand how u are our president and u still don’t support black lives matter I might be young but I know my facts and I think u need to follow in my footsteps because I really don’t want to for another 4 years I know this is not going directly to u but whoever is reading let the 🍊(trump=🍊) read this so yea and we are going to save tiktok and we will do whatever we have to do and make sure u watch the simpsons they predict the future and the latest episode your in a casket.

attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️✨Chicken for McNuggets 2020✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: As a Latina~ 🇲🇽for Trump, I’m all for it. So obviously I had to download this app and catch up on some fake news 🙈😌and propaganda. Yet, when I opened the app I saw noodles(noods)🍝 of some old crusty musty dusty and ofc crispy old man 🍊w/ a small weewee. So I began scrolling through the app and it started to suggest some tanning salons, Cheeto cheese puffs, and recipes for taco Tuesday night LYSOL margaritas🍹?!?! A few mins later I saw an orange 🍊 rolling through my streets and giving kids cooties?!?! Would never recommend this app again?!?! Not to mention they tracked me down trying to have me join the r*pist/pedo association👀😳— so I packed my shiii and ran to the Bermuda Triangle☢️ and I’m chilling with old Kanye rn. If I don’t answer in three days PLZ SeND HElp fOR BOth Of Us🥵... may god bless you all😌

attributes.title: i am in debt, thank you trump
attributes.review: i can no longer stand this app!!!😡 Whenever i open it all i see is a clown 🤡this app is a scam😒 its so horrible to see them dishonor our prisedent lik this 😞 and it steal so much information to sell to russia and china 🧐🤨☹️ and now my phone number has been disabled because i typed it in 🙄 now i’ve had to run and had in cuba 🍃 free healthcare but then i got targeted there😝 so i went to puerto rico and they somehow knew i had the app, it’s not like music plays from it even after you close it🙄 so they sent me out back to florida 💅🏼 but they alligators didn’t even want me there 😎 so now i’m currently hiding in a bunker like our prasidant for my safety, because i thought it’d be nice to support him and his app. NEVER AGAIN!!! 🤓😫😖😣😔😟😕🙁🙂😌

attributes.title: Worst
attributes.review: So His administration is thinking of getting rid of the tik tok like banning it in America now I will say that is not a good idea because there are billions and I mean billions of people who use that app to either keep their self entertained or to make content for people now getting rid of that you’re gonna have billions hating you which possibly means you’re not going to be president now if you want to be president I’d recommend you keep the app get rid of any other App but keep TikTok because I don’t think you want billions of young kids coming for you also what else do u expect your citizens to do during this “second” wave of corona???? We have made this platform on tik tok now your just going to take that..... They say Gen Z is a powerful generation

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I opened the app and was appalled the see the flashing lights while I waited for it to load. I’m lucky I didn’t seize! On top that, this app took 24 hours the download. I waited because I figured that this app must be revolutionary to take that long. It was revolutionary. Revolutionarily TERRIBLE!! The flashing I mentioned earlier lasted five minutes. After 30 seconds I noticed that it wasn’t just lights flashing, but nude photographs of the president, his children, and all his previous lovers. A few times I saw a picture of Jeff Epstein that read “miss you buddy” I will be deleting this app immediately. All I wanted to do was get the real news. Not all the wretched fake news about our lovely president! But it would seem that CNN is telling the truth. Terrible app!!🤮

attributes.title: BAD JUJU
attributes.review: So i am a witch😊and i decided to get this app you know because i wanted to see what my aunt was going crazy about🙄but right when i pressed the button one of the kids in my basement escaped😡 so i was mad but i didn’t think anything  it then the cops came to my house😱so i told them i was white and they left😚then i heard something upstairs and that’s where i keep my old lady’s and one of them died😢and i was kind of suspicious😒and then i started to use the app and then i stubbed my toe😭then i spilled all of my ingredients for one of my spells🥺i realized that it was the app🤦🏽‍♀️BAD JUJU don’t get it👀it doesn’t do anything anyway i just wanted to support “MY” President but the app was too bad for me🙃it is evil👿but a good app you could get is tik tok😁but thissss witchhhh out✊🏽✌🏽

attributes.title: Seriously
attributes.review: I knew Trump sucked at technology but this is next level. There was no clear way to go from tab to tab in the app. Plus it kept on closing me out. There was also a constant pop up asking me to donate. If you app says it wants to keep me informed then that’s all it should want to do. Because of this app I have become completely liberal. I will be voting for Biden because a politician who can’t understand something that is part of everyday life can’t be elected. Also getting rid of TikTok is his way of trying to silence Gen Z and make sure they have no way to effectively communicate. That way he can stop them from embarrassing him and trying to stop him. Basically he’s trying to stop our right to free speech.

attributes.title: This app LITERALLY made my socks WET
attributes.review: I’m writing this because I am truly disappointed and very confused. Shortly after downloading this app I started to feel a warm sensation in my feet. At first I thought that perhaps I found my way on top of a lit stove again without my knowledge (long story) but upon further inspection I found that I was not! The warm quickly turned cold and that’s when I realized that my socks were indeed SOAKED. Not damp like a paper towel used to clean your mail box but WET. REAL. REAL. SOPPING. WET. I’m at a loss for words. I supported our president. until my stiammmmalas check all I haded was the money from sellin clothe thanks daddy donald you big strong slimy neon tangerine lookin donkey fingernail freakin swamp possum pig pirate. Thanks for COMPLETELY soaking the only pair of socks I had 😓

attributes.title: Can’t start the app!
attributes.review: I was really hoping to have a lovely experience with this app so that I could be well informed and notified but I couldn’t even get going on the app because as soon as I opened it there was this horrible image. It was like this gross orange.. I can’t even describe it, this vaguely man-looking THING. I was so repulsed that I couldn’t even look at the screen for more than two seconds. I don’t know what kind of person would hack this app and put that horrible image in there, assaulting the eyes of so many innocent people. Truly disappointing. Even now, just typing this review is bringing back the trauma... the picture of that horrible orange, balding, revolting... MONSTER will truly haunt me to the end of my days. Do not buy.
